title: Productivity, key to plenty
brief_description: Produced in co-operation with the Twentieth Century Fund, based on a study by the Fund entitled “America’s needs and resources”, by Dr J Frederic Dewhurst and collaborators. This film aims to analyse America’s production and consumption.
